page.content: {UNEMPLOYMENT, WAGES, CONDITIONS. { {UNEMPLOYMENT :}15% OF THE WORKFORCE ARE UNEMPLOYED. LOWER-PAID INCLUDE TEACHERS AND STORE MANAGERS(Â£8,000). LEAST WELL-PAID ARE SHOP ASSISTANTS AND FACTORY WORKERS(Â£4,000). N.B. SALARY FIGURES APPROXIMATE. {CONDITIONS :}NEARLY EVERYONE WORKS UNDER HYGIENIC, PLEASANT CONDITIONS, SINCE GLENROTHES IS A NEW TOWN WITH FACTORIES LARGELY PURPOSE_BUILT. ONLY MECHANICS ETC.
